name: Cooking Simulator (itch) (KillerOfArrows)
description: Want to eat food but don't want the guilt of eating? Play this game instead as it will NOT make you hungry. Have fun making a terrible rainbow of America's most enjoyed foods. Each item has a specific recipe that is sure to make your day just as bad as the food itself. Experience the best of all foods together in a boss fight that will make your mouth dry. Your mouth will not water it will be dry. Terribly, terribly dry.
